bs-socialblog-type: Label for option "blog" in entry field "type"
bs-socialblog-entityblog-header-create: Header for a blog entry, that is not yet existing{{Identical|New Blog}}
bs-socialblog-entityblog-header:
{{notranslate}}
Headline for a "blog" entry. Must link to special page [[Special:Blog/$3|Special:Blog/$3]]
* $1 - Username of the owner of this entry
* $2 - Real name of the owner of this entry
* $3 - Main part of title of the source page, this entry is saved in as json data
* $4 - Namespace number of the page, this entry is saved in as json data
* $5 - Namespace name of the page, this entry is saved in as json data
* $6 - Title of the blog entry
bs-socialblog-entityblog-content-more-bt:
Short label for button that expands the content of the blog entry.
{{Identical|More}}

Short label for button that shrinks the content of the blog entry to a teaser.
{{Identical|Less}}
bs-socialblog-toc-useblogteaser: User option in [[Special:Preferences]] that allowes the user to de-/activate, that expandable teaser text is used for blog entries in the timeline
bs-socialblog-special-blog-heading:
{{doc-special}}
Special page header for [[Special:Blog]] special page.
bs-socialblog-special-blog-heading-entry:
Special page header for [[Special:Blog]] special page when a single blog entry parameter is given as a subpage.
* $1 - Title of the blog entry
bs-socialblog-config-mainlinks-blog-labe: Label for checkbox in config, that shows entrypoint "Blog" in the left navigation
bs-socialblog-config-mainlinks-blog-help: Help message for checkbox in config, that shows entrypoint "Blog" in the left navigation
bs-socialblog-type-groupblog: Label for option "groupblog" in entry field "type"
bs-socialblog-groupblog-permission-error: Error message when a user is not allowed to perform an action
bs-social-blog-mainlinks-label:
Title for link used in the left navigation for the page name of [[Special:Blog]].
{{Identical|Blog}}
bs-social-event-blog-create:
Notification text when blog entry is created.
$1 - agent
$2 - blog title
bs-social-event-blog-edit:
Notification text when blog entry is edited.
$1 - agent
$2 - blog title
bs-social-event-blog-delete:
Notification text when blog entry is deleted.
$1 - agent
$2 - blog title
bs-social-notification-blog-primary-link: Label for primary link button, leading to blog page
